reviews.review: No compren este juego, su comunidad es en gran parte ni√±os ratas toxicos que sus padres no les colocan atencion o les colocan mucha, enserio no se que paso con este juego, ya apesta, el crossplay trajo la mierda de ni√±os ratas, enserio ahorren putasos al computador y aparte los desarrolladores no hacen nada para el campeo y tunneleo de estos asesinos ni√±os ratas, pero en cambio como superviviente si te toca mamarte tus cuervos si te quedas quieto osea cosas sin sentido, creo que la logica de ellos esta en el culo, apesta Dead By Daylight, enserio pareciera que el juego fuese producido por una compa√±ia de garage, ENSERIO NO COMPREN ESTE JUEGO
Ow, jogo mt top, s√≥ precisa de servidor dedicado brasileiro

Honestly since I started playing this game my only problem with it was the high ping and constant lag, I don't know what they are doing with their servers but I hope this is stationary.Regards to the game itself, a really good horror game

I wait for 20 minutes for a match as a killer. When I'm playing I just get trolled by survivors because they can go one way then the other when I get close. That is dumb and not what a horror game should be like at all. The killer is so sluggish and feels weak. Why can't you kill people? You have to hang them up and you can't even slash at them, and then another person can take them down in a second. I understand that it would be easy to make the killer OP but at least make them fun to play. The survivors just fuck with you until someone gets the exit open. Just an awful game to me and not even worth the on-sale price.

creo que eh jugado lo suficiente asi que podre dar una rese√±a adecuada.
primero que nada el juego es muy bueno, saben aprovechar el modo de juego y las mecanicas son muy divertidas tanto de superviviente como de asesino la cantidad de perks que tienes disponible hace que puedas armar tus propias builds deacuerdo a tu modo de juego ya sea mas a lo rambo o estrategico, los precios de los killers son muy accesibles asi que no es un p2w para conseguir perks mejores ya que todos los puedes conseguir por medio del dinero del juego. La duracion de la partida depende mucho de que tan bueno sean los survs o el killer.
lo malo es que aun hay muchos bugs como los golpes fantasmas que no te dan pero aun asi recibes da√±o, la falta de servidores dedicados que nos han estado prometiendo hace mucho pero que aun no lo implementan, si tienes un mal internet siendo killer preparate para no encontrar partida casi nunca ya que la mayoria se saldra por el ping alto.
al final de todo es juego que tiene bugs como cualquier juego pero aun asi es muy divertido jugarlo en ambos bandos y jugarlo con amigos es todavia mas divertido  asi que si quieres probar adelante su precio lo vale

[b][u] Dead by Daylight [/u][/b] tinha como promissa um jogo de Terror/Horror Survival 1 v 4 aonde um Killer tem como objetivo sacrificar 4 sobreviventes que por sua vez precisam escapar. 
[b] Como mec√¢nica [/b] : 5 geradores precisam serem ligados para os 2 port√µes de sa√≠da energizarem e serem abertos dando a rota de fuga aos Sobreviventes, o Assassino tendo que impedir esse objetivo derrubando os Sobreviventes e os colocando em ganchos espalhados pelo mapa.
O jogo tomou rumos bem diferente e meio competitivo do que divertido, aonde o desbalanceamento √© alto e players jogam para ver qual build √© mais [b] broken e t√≥xica [/b]. Jogadores por sua maior parte s√£o t√≥xicos em sua gameplay quando em p√≥s-game. O jogo √© fica frustante at√© com amigos caso entrem numa sala com um Assassino T√≥xico.

Jogo excelente para um amante de filmes cl√°ssicos de terror ou simplesmente para quem curte ficar com o cora√ß√£o na m√£o a cada segundo !!!

This game really puts you inside of your own horror movie. Every time you play it's a different, thrilling experience. Getting good will take some practice and time, but mastering characters really shows off your skill in this game. Being a survivor is a terrifying time, and tracking them down as a killer is endless fun. A very, very solid game with lots of references and cameos. Having a not very powerful computer will hurt your playing however.
It's playable, atleast most of the time.
Fun game with friends, i am shocked :D
While some matches can be annoying and a few bugs here and there, Dead by daylight is still an enjoyable experience
The game has it's problems but overall I usually have a good time playing it. Kind of a steep learning curve especially for solo players
hit boxes are still pretty wonky but its aight.
The game has a lot of issues, but at face value it's a fun game especially when you play with your friends.
Amazing game that is very fun

Even though the game is sometimes plagued with minor bugs, overall it is a fun experience. The developers do a good job keeping these feeling fresh with new killers, survivors, maps, and reworks of older ones. Just make sure to pick up an extra package of salt before trying to rank up.

Funny, but scary. Despite the low cost, not very popular. There are flaws, but I still recommend.
